All_Products.name: ECOFLOW DELTA 2 Extra Battery, 1kWh Added Capacity For Home Backup
All_Products.description: 【Extra battery capacity】Add on to your DELTA 2 to expand capacity to 2048Wh. Easy setup to meet a wide range of needs from home backup power to outdoor use. 【Lasts years on end】As a portable battery with an LFP battery chemistry, it lasts years on end with regular use. 3000+ cycles to be precise. 【Charge your way】The DELTA 2 Extra Battery allows you to charge fast with multiple methods. Choose AC outlets, car outlets, solar panels or even our Smart Generator. With that, you can go for 0-80% in 80 mins. 【Power pretty much anything】With a 1800W output & 13 outlets when paired with DELTA 2, you can power 90% of home appliances. 【Control and monitor】With an onboard LCD screen and an EcoFlow app you can check all your essentials. Remaining charge, hours remaining at current output, and a whole lot more.  Our mission is to empower both individuals and communities through portable, clean, and reliable power, by replacing the traditional gas generator and reinventing the way the world accesses energy.

All_Products.name: Tutu 43" Inches Smart LED TV (43Q1) - Black +1 Year Warranty
All_Products.description: Introducing the sleek and sophisticated 43" Inches Smart LED TV (43Q1) in Black, the perfect addition to any modern living space. This state-of-the-art television boasts a stunning 43-inch display, providing crystal-clear visuals and vibrant colors that will bring your favorite movies, TV shows, and games to life. Equipped with smart technology, this LED TV allows you to access a world of entertainment right at your fingertips. With built-in Wi-Fi connectivity, you can easily stream your favorite content from popular apps like Netflix, Hulu, and YouTube. The user-friendly interface makes navigating through your favorite shows and movies a breeze, while the powerful processor ensures smooth and seamless performance. The 43" Inches Smart LED TV (43Q1) also features a range of connectivity options, including HDMI and USB ports, allowing you to easily connect your devices and enjoy your media in stunning high definition. Whether you're watching the big game or catching up on the latest blockbuster, this TV delivers an immersive viewing experience that will keep you coming back for more. In addition to its impressive performance, this LED TV is also designed with style in mind. The sleek black finish and slim profile make it a stylish addition to any room, while the included remote control ensures effortless operation from the comfort of your couch. Upgrade your entertainment experience with the 43" Inches Smart LED TV (43Q1) in Black. With its cutting-edge technology, stunning visuals, and sleek design, this TV is sure to impress even the most discerning viewer.

All_Products.name: Senwei 1.8kva Ecology Generator (Eco2020s)
All_Products.description: Senwei( formerly Elepaq) Generator is a very reliable and pocket friendly generator. It has a capacity of 1.8kva generator for your home appliances. It can be used with Electric pressing iron when other home appliances are switched off, but is not suitable for air conditioners. This generator have a low noise level and consumes very little making it one of the most efficient generators in the market. It is really work friendly. The tank capacity is 8 Litres.  This generator  is produced with Nigeria market in focus as it can work for a very long time non stop. The 8liters capacity can last for upto 10.5 hours at 50% load  Features: Brand: Senwei Model Number: Eco2020S Capacity: 1.8KVA Engine Model: LT168F-16.5HP Ignition system : Transistor magneto Engine Displacement: 196cc Noise Level: 65db Engine oil capacity:0.6 liters Tank capacity:8 liters Engine type:  Air cooled 4 stroke single cylinder Continuous operating time: 12 hours

All_Products.name: Binatone 16 Inches Standing Fan (A1691) - Black + 2 Years Warranty
All_Products.description: This fan is a onetime investment and is perfect for domestic use. This is one of Binatone most sturdy models. It can revolve 360 degrees and its height is adjustable to 1.5m.  Its motor runs silently as to not disturb you while sleeping or otherwise. It’s has three fan speeds. The angle of the blades has been inclined for maximum efficiency. Binatone also makes sure to make it safe; they thusly installed 128 ribs for cage around the fan. Another reason that this is good for domestic use That It has a long motor life. Finally, the black and silver aesthetics make it a wholesome deal.  Its modern in design. Add this modern stand fan to your house or office today to beat the coming summers. This elegant, sturdy stand fan is simple to operate with 3-speed buttons. The blades provide gentle and breezy, to full power airflow, while being silent at all settings. This high-class, high-efficiency stand-fan is designed for elegance and durability. With its powerful blades, 3-speed mode, and height-rotation adjustment, it will cool your place as and where you prefer.
